channel.title: lecture notes on Pascal Michaillat
channel.description: Recent content in lecture notes on Pascal Michaillat

item.title: Mathematical Methods for Macroeconomics
item.description: This course covers basic mathematical methods for macroeconomics: dynamic programming, differential equations, and optimal control.

item.title: Intermediate Macroeconomics
item.description: This course covers material from intermediate macroeconomics: IS-LM, unemployment, inflation, Malthusian growth, and Solowian growth.
